FuncDef:
The qos pq drr command configures a scheduling mode for an interface queue.
The undo qos pq drr command restores the default scheduling mode for an interface queue. The qos pq drr command configures a scheduling mode for an interface queue. The undo qos pq drr command restores the default scheduling mode for an interface queue. By default, the scheduling mode of queues on an interface is PQ. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
CLIs: undo qos { pq { <start-queue-index> [ to <end-queue-index> ] } &<1-8> | drr { <start-queue-index> [ to <end-queue-index> ] } &<1-8> }
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,Interface group view

ParaDef.Info:
Sets the scheduling mode to PQ.
-

Start queue index.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 7.

End queue index.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 7.

Sets the scheduling mode to WDRR and specifies the WDRR weight.
-
